game_description: Chimp Chase is a game that is based on the popular game, Gorilla Tag. In Chimp Chase our main goal was to make the most out of the Gorilla Locomotion, we have done things that haven't been done in Gorilla Tag. There are many fun things and activities to engage in and we have many ways to interact with the game.
review_1: I don't know why am I so lonely in that game I just really want to play horror. Does anybody know if the servers are fixed or not because I used toseen the sign that says servers are broken but know it's gone so that's why I am asking this.
review_2: I got on chimp chase and it was discontinued but when I went the the cams I saw a bright red monkey and then I got jumpscared. At first I thought it was just a repeating video to scare people as a joke, but then I saw the bookshelf door open then the red monkey was in the room I was in and I heard another jumpscared noise but by then I had already taken off my headset in fear. Please reply I want to know if it was intentional.
review_3: Good PVP but can you try finding the banana? Almost halfway there Almost We’re halfway there🥳 Almost there Almost Come on M You found the banana 🍌🍌🍌🍌
